name: Grade Calculator
text: Calculate your final grades using this website! Enter your scores and receive a predicted final grade immediately!

name: QuickNotes 2
text: Fast and intuitive windows forms application for notetaking; integrates auto-highlighting, file storage system, and responsive UI to amplify a student's academic proficiency.

name: QuickNotes 3
text: Lightweight variation of QuickNotes2 that utilizes user's file system to minimize application complexity

name: Memory Trainer
text: Old website dedicated to helping students memorize large amounts of information when studying for coursework, utilizes basic javascript to help user add/remove (key: description) pairs to memorize

name: Sewon Kim
text: My old portfolio website made with only html and css (warning: bad design)
